description:
Penelope Green is a reporter in the Styles department, for which she has written about a failed commune; the allure of Alexa, Amazon's smooth-talking domestic bot; hygge, the Danish obsession with coziness; and Patti Smith, at home in the Far Rockaways.
She has been a reporter for the Home section, an editor of Styles of The Times, an early iteration of the Styles sections, and a story editor at The New York Times Magazine. Before joining The Times in 1990, she was an editor at 7 Days, a city weekly. She lives in Manhattan.
title: Penelope Green
text:
Penelope Green is a reporter in the Styles department, for which she has written about a failed commune; the allure of Alexa, Amazon's smooth-talking domestic bot; hygge, the Danish obsession with coziness; and Patti Smith, at home in the Far Rockaways.
She has been a reporter for the Home section, an editor of Styles of The Times, an early iteration of the Styles sections, and a story editor at The New York Times Magazine. Before joining The Times in 1990, she was an editor at 7 Days, a city weekly. She lives in Manhattan.
